name: BlockJump (SocialSide)
description:
This is about a cube trying to jump over lava to get saved by the lava. You can even collect coins and buy different skins through different amount of coins. New skins will be added time to time and suggestion can be given on discord or in comments

Controls AWSD Keys
  1. A Key - Move Left
  2. D Key - Move Right
  3. W Key - Jump
Arrow Keys
  1. Left arrow - Move Left
  2. Right arrow - Move Right
  3. Up arrow - Jump
Others
  1. Space - Jump
Happy Gaming SocialSide
